notes.title: Funding
notes.p: Erasmus Kotey was supported by a WACCBIP-World Bank ACE PhD fellowship grant (ACE02-WACCBIP: Awandare). Erasmus Kotey was also supported by the United States Naval Medical Research Unit 3 via the Globe Project at the Noguchi Memorial Institute for Medical Research during his experiential learning. Deimante Lukosaityte and Munir Iqbal was supported by The Pirbright Institute and the British Council (Newton-Mosharafa Fund) Institutional link grant number 261727271 and BBSRC grants numbers BB/L018853/1, BB/S013792/1, BB/N002571/1, BBS/E/I/00007030, BBS/E/I/00007031, BBS/E/I/00007035. The views expressed in this publication are solely those of the authors and not necessarily those of the funders.
